html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-02662024-03-25FIN
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAggregate borrowing limit for the 2024-25 fiscal year
PrecisOrder amending Order in Council P.C. 2024-0132 of February 15, 2024 to 1) specify $604 billion to be the maximum aggregate principal amount of money which may be borrowed by the Minister of Finance in the 2024-2025 fiscal year to permit operations related to the management of the public debt; and 2) designate which officials from Finance Canada and the Bank of Canada are authorized to sign and countersign securities of Canada.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order amending Order in Council P.C. 2024-0132 of February 15, 2024 to 1) specify $604 billion to be the maximum aggregate principal amount of money which may be borrowed by the Minister of Finance in the 2024-2025 fiscal year to permit operations related to the management of the public debt; and 2) designate which officials from Finance Canada and the Bank of Canada are authorized to sign and countersign securities of Canada.
